creator: GameFirst Mobile
descriptionHtml:
The best free strategy game about religion! Top-end god simulator in the popular sandbox strategy genre. Become a God! Unite the whole world with one faith! Create your own unique religion!

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ FEATURES ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

✅ OFFLINE STRATEGY GAME
Play our strategy game of God & religion simulator in offline mode, without the Internet.

✅ MULTIPLAYER MODE (Coming Soon)
Play with your friends in a game mode on the network, not only for two, but also for three and even four players.

✅ EXCELLENT GRAPHICS
Divine graphics with a beautiful & thoughtful interface.

✅ SIMULATOR GAMEPLAY
Gameplay for relaxing in the evening: collect points of faith with a click and learn religious aspects. Enjoy the game of God!

✅ MULTI-LANGUAGE (Coming Soon)
The interface of the strategy game is translated into different languages: English, German, French, Spanish, Portuguese, Russian. Play & have fun!

✅ FREE GOD SIMULATOR GAME
Download and enjoy the free version of Religion Inc.

✅ START YOUR WAY
Choose your country which will begin the ascent your religion. Get Enlightenment Points & grow.

✅ PREPARE FOR CHALLENGES
Acquire various abilities from various ways of distribution to divine miracles. Adapt to the different countries, developments and challenges of the time.

✅ CONQUER THE WHOLE WORLD
Think like a strategist, develop strategies, count your every move, think over the tactics of spreading religion around the world and conquer it!

✅ PLAY LIKE GOD
Create your own unique religion. Check how she meets the challenges of the times, and whether she can resist the pressure of tests and bring humanity to unity.

✅ BUILD CIVILIZATION
Play for civilization & gods! Create a virtual civilization and help it exist on the planet. Go from one civilization to another. Discover the ancient world, discover the Middle Ages and the modern world!

✅ KEEP ALL UNDER CONTROL
Severity and fanaticism can lead to the resistance of unbelieving rebels. They can frustrate all your plans and have to fight with him.

Our social media:
https://discord.gg/sgFMnZn
https://www.facebook.com/religiongame
https://www.instagram.com/religion_inc/

title: God Simulator. Sandbox strategy game Religion Inc.

creator: GameFirst Mobile
descriptionHtml:
Religion inc – is a simulator of creating a religion in a popular genre of strategy. Will you find a way to unite the whole world under one faith? Create your own unique religion using different combinations of religious aspects!

Humanity would always experience a compulsive need to believe in something bigger than ourselves. They would search for comfort in the darkness: the light that would enlighten their path in the shadows of millennia. For millions of people at all times this light used to be and still is faith. It was religion that became this guiding light which gave many people the meaning of their lives in this universe, helped them to hold out against the storms of changes and to come ashore of happiness. There are many religions in the world. Each of them gave its own response to the defiance of times and changes. But what other way could this process go? What other diversified and bizarre shapes did human beliefs take? The answers to these questions you will find in our new game. Create your own unique religion. Test if it can hold against the challenges of the times, the pressure of obstacles and bring the humanity together.

Game characteristics:
· Diverse archetypes of religions with unique cultural values and traditions!
· Open all archetypes for the victory: Monotheism, Spiritualism, Pantheon, Shamanism, Heathenry and others!
· Will the believers become furious fanatics or reach higher enlightenment? It all depends on you!
· Hundreds of actual religious aspects and we will add more! Learn more about religions!
· Unique active skills for each archetype. Show miracles to the world!
· Relaxing gameplay for night timing: collect belief points with the help of a click and learn religious aspects. Play and enjoy!

title: God Simulator. Sandbox strategy game Religion Inc.

creator: GameFirst Mobile
descriptionHtml:
Humanity would always experience a compulsive need to believe in something bigger than ourselves. They would search for comfort in the darkness: the light that would enlighten their path in the shadows of millennia. For millions of people at all times this light used to be and still is faith. It was religion that became this guiding light which gave many people the meaning of their lives in this universe, helped them to hold out against the storms of changes and to come ashore of happiness. There are many religions in the world. Each of them gave its own response to the defiance of times and changes. But what other way could this process go? What other diversified and bizarre shapes did human beliefs take? The answers to these questions you will find in our new game. Create your own unique religion. Test if it can hold against the challenges of the times, the pressure of obstacles and bring the humanity together.

Religion inc – is a simulator of creating a religion in a popular genre of strategy. Will you find a way to unite the whole world under one faith? Create your own unique religion using different combinations of religious aspects!

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ FEATURES ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
· Diverse archetypes of religions with unique cultural values and traditions!
Many different ancient religions of the world: Monotheism, Spiritualism, Pantheon, Shamanism, Paganism and others! More than 6 religions are already in the game!
Will the believers become furious fanatics or reach higher enlightenment? It all depends on you! Absolute freedom in a sandbox game about religions and god simulator!
· Hundreds of actual religious aspects and we will add more! Learn more about ancient religions!
* Move from one civilization to another. Discover the ancient world, and then discover the Middle Ages and the modern world! Can your religion resist the challenge of time and withstand all changes?
· Unique active skills for each religion archetypes. Show miracles to the world!
· Create world how you like. Be creative! Full universe sandbox! Lot of random events!
· Will your civilization withstand the pressure of time and change? Influence entire civilizations!

✅ OFFLINE STRATEGY GAME
Play our strategy game of God & religion simulator in offline mode, without the Internet.
✅ EXCELLENT GRAPHICS
Divine graphics with a beautiful & thoughtful interface.

✅ PREPARE FOR CHALLENGES

✅ CONQUER THE WHOLE WORLD

✅ PLAY LIKE GOD
Create your own unique religion. Check how she meets the challenges of the times, and whether she can resist the pressure of tests and bring humanity to unity.

✅ BUILD CIVILIZATION

✅ KEEP ALL UNDER CONTROL

New event system!

title: Religion Inc. God Simulator

creator: GameFirst Mobile
descriptionHtml:
Humanity would always experience a compulsive need to believe in something bigger than ourselves. They would search for comfort in the darkness: the light that would enlighten their path in the shadows of millennia. For millions of people at all times this light used to be and still is faith. It was religion that became this guiding light which gave many people the meaning of their lives in this universe, helped them to hold out against the storms of changes and to come ashore of happiness. There are many religions in the world. Each of them gave its own response to the defiance of times and changes. But what other way could this process go? What other diversified and bizarre shapes did human beliefs take? The answers to these questions you will find in our new game. Create your own unique religion. Test if it can hold against the challenges of the times, the pressure of obstacles and bring the humanity together.

Religion inc – is a simulator of creating a religion in a popular genre of strategy. Will you find a way to unite the whole world under one faith? Create your own unique religion using different combinations of religious aspects!

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ FEATURES ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
· Diverse archetypes of religions with unique cultural values and traditions!
Many different ancient religions of the world: Monotheism, Spiritualism, Pantheon, Shamanism, Paganism and others! More than 6 religions are already in the game!
Will the believers become furious fanatics or reach higher enlightenment? It all depends on you! Absolute freedom in a sandbox game about religions and god simulator!
· Hundreds of actual religious aspects and we will add more! Learn more about ancient religions!
* Move from one civilization to another. Discover the ancient world, and then discover the Middle Ages and the modern world! Can your religion resist the challenge of time and withstand all changes?
· Unique active skills for each religion archetypes. Show miracles to the world!
· Create world how you like. Be creative! Full universe sandbox! Lot of random events!
· Will your civilization withstand the pressure of time and change? Influence entire civilizations!

✅ OFFLINE STRATEGY GAME
Play our strategy game of God & religion simulator in offline mode, without the Internet.
✅ EXCELLENT GRAPHICS
Divine graphics with a beautiful & thoughtful interface.

✅ PREPARE FOR CHALLENGES
Acquire various abilities from various ways of distribution to divine miracles. Adapt to the different countries, developments and challenges of the time.

✅ CONQUER THE WHOLE WORLD
Think like a strategist, develop strategies, count your every move, think over the tactics of spreading religion around the world and conquer it!

✅ PLAY LIKE GOD
Create your own unique religion. Check how she meets the challenges of the times, and whether she can resist the pressure of tests and bring humanity to unity.

✅ BUILD CIVILIZATION

It was religion that became this guiding light which gave many people the meaning of their lives in this universe, helped them to hold out against the storms of changes and to come ashore of happiness. There are many religions in the world. Each of them gave its own response to the defiance of times and changes. But what other way could this process go? What other diversified and bizarre shapes did human beliefs take? The answers to these questions you will find in our new game. Create your own unique religion. Test if it can hold against the challenges of the times, the pressure of obstacles and bring the humanity together.

FEATURES

Diverse archetypes of religions with unique cultural values and traditions!
Many different ancient religions of the world: Monotheism, Spiritualism, Pantheon, Shamanism, Paganism and others!
Will the believers become furious fanatics or reach higher enlightenment? It all depends on you! Absolute freedom in a sandbox game about religions and god simulator!
Hundreds of actual religious aspects and we will add more! Learn more about ancient religions!
Move from one civilization to another. Discover the ancient world, and then discover the Middle Ages and the modern world! Can your religion resist the challenge of time and withstand all changes?
Unique active skills for each religion archetypes. Show miracles to the world!
Create world how you like. Be creative! Full universe sandbox! Lot of random events!
Will your civilization withstand the pressure of time and change? Influence entire civilizations!

OFFLINE STRATEGY GAME
Play our strategy game of God & religion simulator in offline mode, without the Internet.
EXCELLENT GRAPHICS
Divine graphics with a beautiful & thoughtful interface.

PREPARE FOR CHALLENGES
Acquire various abilities from various ways of distribution to divine miracles. Adapt to the different countries, developments and challenges of the time.

CONQUER THE WHOLE WORLD
Think like a strategist, develop strategies, count your every move, think over the tactics of spreading religion around the world and conquer it!

PLAY LIKE A GOD
Create your own unique religion. Check how she meets the challenges of the times, and whether she can resist the pressure of tests and bring humanity to unity.

BUILD CIVILIZATION
Play for civilization & gods! Create a virtual civilization and help it exist on the planet. Go from one civilization to another. Discover the ancient world, discover the Middle Ages and the modern world!

KEEP ALL UNDER CONTROL
Severity and fanaticism can lead to the resistance of unbelieving rebels. They can frustrate all your plans and have to fight with him.

Humanity would always experience a compulsive need to believe in something bigger than ourselves. They would search for comfort in the darkness: the light that would enlighten their path in the shadows of millennia. For millions of people at all times this light used to be and still is faith. It was religion that became this guiding light which gave many people the meaning of their lives in this universe, helped them to hold out against the storms of changes and to come ashore of happiness. There are many religions in the world. Each of them gave its own response to the defiance of times and changes. But what other way could this process go? What other diversified and bizarre shapes did human beliefs take? The answers to these questions you will find in our new game. Create your own unique religion. Test if it can hold against the challenges of the times, the pressure of obstacles and bring the humanity together.
